Content.Text:
Well hmmm... What about him? He IS rather
cute, and with that sweet personality too...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey there <MYNAME>. Good to see you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, oh my! Well hellooooo, <MYNAME>. Come
on in and grab a seat, honey.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Soooooo! We were just talking about health and
beauty. I'm sure you're dying to chime in?
Naturally!
Sorry, not now.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Splendid! Listen up and I'll start from the
beginning. I might get a bit long-winded, but
like many long things, it'll be great in the end.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a shame.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But you ARE already here, honey. Surely you can
listen in just a little? I promise it'll be
informative.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please be gentle, doctor...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it'll be fine. There's nothing to be worried
about.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very well. I shall start at the foundation by
explaining the elemental nature of "beauty."
<PAGE>
"Beauty" is stimuli--most often visual--which
elicits a release of dopamine in the brain,
causing sensations of happiness or satisfaction.
<PAGE>
Upon receiving the signals from your sensory
organs, your brain then interprets that signal as
blah blah blah science medicine science...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thus, we can confidently say that "beauty" is a
wonderous, nebulous condition that radiates
from a person, as though it were an aura.
<PAGE>
It is most certainly not something created by the
application or use of external products. You
understand, don't you honey?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L>...Hn?!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh, Doctor...that may be enough for today's
lesson. <MYNAME> is starting to...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh goodness. What's wrong, honey? Your
eyelids look heavy, and there's...drool hanging
from the corner of your mouth.
<PAGE>
Hmm...Maybe I did ramble on for a teeny tiny bit
too long.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess I can let you off the hook today, then.
<PAGE>
But since you were faaabulous enough to stay
and listen to me preach my philosophy, I have a
special present I know you'll love.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L><FACE_LAUGH>I hereby officially induct you into the "Beautiful
Dreamer Alliance!"

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not that our alliance does anything in particular,
but simply being a part of it lets one's inner
radiance and beauty shine forth.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, you look positively fatigued. Let me
give you some medicine that'll perk you right up.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, and feel free to drop by whenever you'd like,
honey. I'm always willing to lend a listening ear.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Take care now.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you care to join us, <MYNAME>?
